Subskills.name: Desert Mass
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of sand vortex.

Subskills.name: Sunken Field
Subskills.description: Summon multiple small sand vortexes around target location with increased damage.

Subskills.name: Shredding Sand
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by sand vortex.

Subskills.name: Stuttering Pull
Subskills.description: Chance to stun monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Desert Control
Subskills.description: Reduces the cooldown of sand vortex.

Subskills.name: Lasting Whirlpool
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of sand vortex.

Subskills.name: Slow Burn
Subskills.description: Sand vortex now doesnâ€™t pull monsters but slows them and inflicts burning for a portion of the damage on hit.

Subskills.name: Veil of Sand
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Brain Damaging Whirl
Subskills.description: Sand vortex now executes targets below a certain percentage of life.

Subskills.name: Accelerated Sand
Subskills.description: Sand vortex size and tick rate increases rapidly but lasts for a shorter duration.

Subskills.name: Cycloning Kraken
Subskills.description: Sand vortex now spawns cycling tornados from its center.
